snippet: In a good start, Mayor Bill de Blasio closed a deal with developers that would add more affordable housing in Brooklyn.
abstract: Editorial welcomes deal between New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration and developer Jed Walentas over redevelopment of the old Domino Sugar refinery in Williamsburg, Brooklyn; contends that deal is a sign that de Blasio can get developers to work with him even while being an unabashed populist.
lead_paragraph: In a good start, Mayor Bill de Blasio closed a deal with developers that would add more affordable housing in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Setting Up a Better Domino Plan
headline.print_headline: Setting Up a Better Domino Plan
